FROM PRTASK TASK WHERE F.TASK_ID = TASK.PRID) END TASK_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN F.TASK_ID = -1 THEN NULL WHEN ABS((SELECT TASK.PRISMILESTONE FROM PRTASK TASK WHERE F.TASK_ID = TASK.PRID)) = 1 THEN 'MILESTONE' WHEN (SELECT TASK.PRWBSLEVEL FROM PRTASK TASK WHERE F.TASK_ID = TASK.PRID) = 1 THEN 'PHASE' WHEN (SELECT TASK.PRWBSLEVEL FROM PRTASK TASK WHERE F.TASK_ID = TASK.PRID) = 2 THEN 'ACTIVITY'
